c74object.name: musicxml2jmsl
c74object.digest: Translate MusicXML files into JSML Score XML format
c74object.description:
musicxml2jmsl
performs automatic translation of MusicXML files into native JMSL Score XML format. The object sends XML data to the second (clone) inlet of the MaxScore object.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: (symbol) Translate MusicXML files into JSML Score XML format

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: (list) Lists prepended by the jmsl or skipped messages.

method.name: filename
method.description: Reads specified MusicXML file. Requires absolute path.

entry.name: symbol
entry.description: MusicXML element parsed successfully are sent out line by line preceded by the jmsl message, all other attributes are sent out as a JSON dict preceded by the skipped message.
